sections.title: I am the Lord your God; you shall not have strange gods before me

questions.text: Have I made God the center of my life and marriage?
Have I trusted in God's plan even when it’s hard?
Have I prioritized prayer in my daily schedule?
Have I modeled faith for my wife and children?
Have I turned to distractions rather than to God for comfort?
Have I led my family in worship or avoided spiritual leadership?
Have I surrendered my decisions to God in prayer?

sections.title: You shall not take the name of the Lord your God in vain

questions.text: Have I spoken God’s name with reverence and respect?
Have I used sacred language irreverently around my family?
Have I allowed or ignored misuse of God’s name in my home?
Have I honored God’s name in prayer and teaching?
Have I taught my children to speak of God with respect?
Have I stayed silent when I should have defended God's honor?
Have I treated prayer with sincerity rather than routine?

sections.title: Remember to keep holy the Lord’s Day

questions.text: Have I attended Mass every Sunday and holy day?
Have I helped my family keep Sunday as a day of worship and rest?
Have I avoided unnecessary work and focused on renewal?
Have I spent quality time with my family in a holy way?
Have I helped my children grow in love for the Lord's Day?
Have I made Sunday a day of joy and thanksgiving?
Have I taught the importance of the Sabbath through example?

sections.title: Honor your father and your mother

questions.text: Have I spoken respectfully of my parents and in-laws?
Have I shown my children how to honor their grandparents?
Have I forgiven family hurts or held onto bitterness?
Have I supported my parents or elders in need?
Have I honored Church authority and spiritual leaders?
Have I modeled obedience and humility toward rightful authority?
Have I encouraged my children to value family roots?
Have I wounded others through harsh speech or neglect?
Have I forgiven offenses or held grudges in my heart?
Have I used anger or frustration instead of love to correct?
Have I created peace or tension in my home?
Have I affirmed and protected the dignity of every person?
Have I taught my children how to forgive and love?
Have I prayed for those I am tempted to judge or resent?
Have I remained faithful in heart, mind, and body?
Have I entertained inappropriate fantasies or images?
Have I guarded my eyes and intentions with purity?
Have I respected the sacredness of intimacy in marriage?
Have I communicated with my wife about love and trust?
Have I upheld marital faithfulness in all my friendships?
Have I confessed impure actions or thoughts sincerely?
Have I been honest and ethical in finances and work?
Have I misused family resources or withheld generosity?
Have I set an example of financial stewardship?
Have I wasted time that belongs to others?
Have I respected others’ property and contributions?
Have I taught my children about honesty and sharing?
Have I supported those in need with what I’ve been given?

sections.title: You shall not bear false witness against your neighbor

questions.text: Have I spoken truthfully and kindly about others?
Have I avoided gossip, especially around my children?
Have I corrected misunderstandings I contributed to?
Have I spoken up when truth needed defending?
Have I apologized for false or uncharitable words?
Have I modeled honesty in all communication?
Have I respected others' reputations and privacy?

sections.title: You shall not covet your neighbor’s wife

questions.text: Have I compared my wife unfairly to others?
Have I nurtured emotional or romantic fantasies outside marriage?
Have I practiced gratitude for my wife daily?
Have I respected the dignity of women in all circumstances?
Have I prayed for a pure heart and mind?
Have I avoided media or settings that tempt impurity?
Have I loved my wife with self-giving tenderness?

sections.title: You shall not covet your neighbor’s goods

questions.text: Have I compared my life or possessions to others’ with envy?
Have I modeled contentment and gratitude for my family?
Have I pursued material things over relationships?
Have I pressured my family for more than we need?
Have I supported a simple and generous lifestyle?
Have I praised others for their blessings without jealousy?
Have I given thanks daily for what God has provided?
